attributes.action: Include NHS Nursing and Healthcare staff pay in the frontline pay rises.
attributes.additional_details: Many more people would have died had it not been for Nursing and Healthcare Staff during the pandemic. An applause was great but let’s really reward them for saving lives and helping keep the country going. Pay them properly for being heroes!
attributes.background: Nurses and other Healthcare workers have been left out of the pay rise for frontline workers but Senior Doctors are included. Without the Nursing and Healthcare staff the Covid-19 pandemic would have been much worse. These staff have been underpaid for far too long.
